select a.acc_id as acc_id ,a.acc_name as acc_name ,a.acc_add2 as acc_add2 ,i.item_num as item_num ,i.item_title as item_title ,i.item_price as item_price ,i.item_option as item_option ,i.item_date as item_date ,i.item_hits as item_hits ,f.savedfile as savedfile ,f.file_index as file_index from account_db a, item_db i, file_db f where a.acc_id = i.acc_id and f.item_num = i.item_num and f.file_index = 1
and i.item_option = 'ticket'
and i.item_option = 'album'
and i.item_option = 'clothes'
and i.item_option = 'goods'
order by item_date desc

select a.acc_id as acc_id ,a.acc_name as acc_name ,a.acc_add2 as acc_add2 ,i.item_num as item_num ,i.item_title as item_title ,i.item_price as item_price ,i.item_option as item_option ,i.item_date as item_date ,i.item_hits as item_hits ,f.savedfile as savedfile ,f.file_index as file_index from account_db a, item_db i, file_db f where a.acc_id = i.acc_id and f.item_num = i.item_num and f.file_index = 1 order by item_date desc

select i.acc_id as acc_id ,i.acc_name as acc_name ,i.item_num as item_num ,i.item_title as item_title ,i.item_price as item_price ,i.item_option as item_option ,i.item_contents as item_contents ,i.item_date as item_date ,i.item_hits as item_hits ,i.item_fileNum as fileNum ,f.savedfile as savedfile ,f.file_index as file_index ,a.acc_add2 as acc_add2 from item_db i, file_db f, account_db a where a.acc_id = i.acc_id and i.item_num = #{item_num} and i.item_num = f.item_num and f.file_index = 1
select f.file_index as file_index ,f.savedfile as savedfile from item_db i, file_db f where f.file_index = #{file_index} and i.item_num = f.item_num and i.item_num = #{item_num}
